page.title: 16SOCIAL SURVEY-LEISURE.
page.content: WE CARRIED OUT A SURVEY AMONGST ADULTS IN AIRDRIE ON HOW THEY SPEND THEIR LEISURE TIME. THIS IS THE INFORMATION WE COLLECTED. IT WOULD APPEAR FROM OUR SURVEY THAT QUITE A NUMBER OF PEOPLE DO NOT KNOW WHAT LEISURE FACILITIES ARE AVAILABLE FOR THEM. COMMENTS SUCH AS "WE DON'T KNOW WHERE TO LOOK" AND "I HAVN'T SEEN THESE THINGS ADVERTISED" WERE QUITE COMMON. THOSE PEOPLE WE INTERVIEWED WHO KNEW OF THE FACILITIES ADMITTED THAT THEY DIDN'T MAKE GOOD USE OF THEM. "I HAVEN'T GOT THE TIME" WAS A COMMON COMPLAINT, ESPECIALLY FROM THE MOTHERS OF YOUNG CHILDREN. THE TYPES OF FACILITIES THAT ARE AVAILABLE INCLUDE AREAS FOR PLAYING SQUASH,BADMINTON,FOOTBALL,TENNIS,TABLE -TENNIS AND POOL. THESE SPORTS AND OTHER PASTIMES CAN BE CARRIED OUT AT VARIUOS COMMUNITY CENTRES-SWIMMING TOO
